content: @Matthew Jasper After https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/63059 hopefully lands, I think we should be good to stabilize -- do you want to write up the final report for the stabilization PR or should I?
We probably are. You should write the stabilization report if you're in any kind of hurry.

You should write the stabilization report if you're in any kind of hurry.

Not really in a hurry but swamped. ^^
I take it you are as well so I'll get to it when I have time I guess. ;)
@Matthew Jasper poke re. https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/63118#discussion_r321393850 -- FCP is done now :slight_smile:
